name: Deadly Stasis
description:
Description:
You are an assistant of a strange character named Gilbert, who has the ability run into stasis for a while/ It means that he can freeze the time. Help Gilbert overcome all the difficulties on his hard way.
Think over your actions in advance, because you have only 30 seconds.

Control:
you should use your mouse and a spacebar.
LMB–grabanobject/enterpassword
Spacebar–on/off stasis mode

Tutorial:
To make it easier to understand the game, attentivelyread the message that Gilbert will give you at the beginning of the first level.
Also don`t forget about tips, which you can find on the right side.
The time of your stasis is limited, so hurry up.

Features:
Many different, hardcore levels
Unusual gameplay
Nice 2D arts
A lot of hidden Easter eggs and achievements
Sea of blood and tons of pain
Some locations will make you really nervous =)
